extension.name: Helix V2 based template installer
extension.description:
Shaper Helix – II is the default/blank template of Helix Framework version 2.
This template has all the in built functionality of Helix 2.0. Helix - II comes with tons of shortcode such for video, gallery, slideshow, tabs, accordion etc. Helix 2.0 especially comes with rich administration features such as logo settings, masterpiece layout builder, mega menu, unlimited fonts control, Google analytics, Less complitation and all types of presets control like header color, link color, background color so on. Now you don’t need to worry about its speed. The built-in css and javascript compresses used by Helix to provide optimal performance.

Key Features

  • Unlimited module positions with the power of unique layout builder
  • Powered by Bootstrap and compatible with Joomla 2.5 and 3.0
  • Three (3) presets with presets manager
  • Uses latest web technologies like html5 and css3
  • Tons of shortcodes in built
  • Built with LESS CSS
  • Megamenu, RTL Support, CSS and JS compression and many more...
